author: andrius.a
content: Hi, admin from other discord said I might find answer in this.

author: andrius.a
content: I'm working on university project. I have a task to write about Merkle Patricia trie changes in Eth 2.0 and similiar parts. Also my person from my team has to write about PoW and PoS in Eth and Eth 2. Can You comment about it or maybe tell us something what would help us in our work?

author: protolambda
content: we'll get back to this. Eth2 launch now, everyone focused on that. Please don't tag groups, just tag people. Group tags are for urgent things

author: andrius.a
content: Oh sorry. I will remove that. And thanks for Your time

author: protolambda
content:
<@!404008509114417154> here's a collection of docs about merkle trees in Eth2 and possible changes/optimizations: https://github.com/protolambda/eth-merkle-trees
And I recommend reading https://blog.ethereum.org/2015/11/15/merkling-in-ethereum/ to get an introduction of eth1 merkleization

author: protolambda
content: The PoW vs PoS topic is huge, I would try and define a smaller scope there, or structure it more like an overview instead of a full in-depth paper about it all

author: protolambda
content: Anyway, if you're interested how Eth2 PoS works, you can read about it here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.03052
